channel.title: Strelok's Improvements pack & Enhanced Shading mod - I have to say, I am impressed.
channel.description:
The entire contents of Strelok's Improvements pack for Half-Life: Source and the Enhanced Shading mod for Half-Life: Source really make a good combination. They make me go :jizz: then :fffuuu: then :freeman: . It's just that awesome.
LINKS: P. 1: [url]https://www.gamebanana.com/skins/60080[/url] Enhanced Shading: [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/hls-enhanced-shaders-2010-custom-enb/downloads/hls-enhanced-shaders-2010-v11[/url]
P. 2: [url]https://www.gamebanana.com/skins/60120[/url] P. 3: [url]https://www.gamebanana.com/skins/62533[/url] P. 4: [url]https://www.gamebanana.com/skins/66188[/url] P. 5: [url]https://www.gamebanana.com/skins/97182[/url] P. 6: [url]https://www.gamebanana.com/skins/102462[/url]
Directions for shading are in the description of the file, strelok's goes into C:\ProgramFiles\steam\steamapps\YOURNAME\Half-Life: Source

item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Black Mesa.
Really, if you want an improved HL: S that’s the way to go. Other than that, get Half-life and pretty it up with some “SD” models. You can also play a lot more mods with HL1 than HL: S.

Read full topic

item.title: Strelok's Improvements pack & Enhanced Shading mod - I have to say, I am impressed.
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
[COLOR=‘DarkOrange’]* Rule 9:[/SIZE]
MAKE SURE YOUR TOPIC HAS A DESCRIPTIVE TITLE!
When we go into a topic entitled, “Hi everyone!” We expect a greeting. When we go into a topic named, “On headcrabs, and their primary attack,” we expect something about when headcrabs attack. Don’t name a topic “Whazzupppp!!!11!oneone!”, then put forth an elaborate suggestion about a topic already discussed to death and expect to walk away lacking scorch marks.

Read full topic
